summary: mm/damon/reclaim: fix potential memory leak in damon_reclaim_init()
details:
mm/damon/reclaim: fix potential memory leak in damon_reclaim_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 700aa4e11a3c4d2a44d06758db431a013d9e1b61, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 4d69c3457821100a39fa8c6e0c23ed910bb6c29d. For more details please see the references link.
